content: अवचनीय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not to be spoken or uttered, obscene or indecent (language); वादेष्ववचनीयेषु तदेव द्विगुणं भवेत् <ls>Ms. 8. 269.</ls> {@--2@} Not censurable, not blamable, free from censure; लोकैरवचनीया भवति <ls>Mk. 2</ls>; °ता; impropriety of speech, freedom from censure; सर्वथा व्यवहर्तव्ये कुतो ह्यवचनीयता <ls>U. 1. 5.</ls>
